data: Ki-pún hun-sek, chhī-tiûŋ sim-chêng hun-sek, kap hong-hiám hun-sek
Le̱k-sṳ chhī-tiûŋ chu-liāu, jîn-lūi kau-hō̱ hoān-khoe, kap bô̱-cho̱-hoā AI goân-kiā̱n
Liōng-hoā kau-e̱k, chu-sán cho̱-ha̱p koán-lí, kap hong-hiám phêng-kó̱
Bi̱t-bé kau-e̱k, Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), kap Solana (SOL)
Kó̱-phiō kau-e̱k kap chu-sán cho̱-ha̱p koán-lí
Le̱k-sṳ kó̱-kè, sin-bûŋn bûŋn-chiuŋ̱, siā-kau mûŋi-thé hoāt-bûŋn, kap êng-lí pò̱-kò̱
Liōng-hoā Kó̱-phiō Tāu-chu kap Chu-sán Cho̱-ha̱p Koán-lí
Le̱k-sṳ kó̱-kè, châi-bū pò̱-kò̱, kū-koán keng-chè chí-piau, chèng-chhek piàn-tòng, chhī-tiûŋ sim-chêng chu-liāu, kap kau-e̱k kì-lo̱k
Chin-si̱t kau-e̱k kì-lo̱k (Xueqiu), Guba Lūn-toâŋ hoāt-bûŋn, Sina kah CNINFO sin-bûŋn, SSE 50 kó̱-phiō chu-liāu
Tāu-chu-chiá hêng-wî bô̱-gí tī kó̱-chhī khoân-kéng lāi
Claude 3.5 Sonnet, GPT-4o, Grok-2, Mistral Large 24.11, GPT-3.5, kah Gemini 1.5 Pro
